},\n    \"action\": {\n      \"type\": \"string\",\n      \"description\": \"Action required if invalid\",\n      \"nullable\": true\n    },\n    \"explanation\": {\n      \"type\": \"string\",\n      \"description\": \"Detailed explanation\"\n    }\n  },\n  \"required\": [\"is_valid\", \"explanation\"],\n  \"additionalProperties\": false\n}\n```\n\n## Examples\n\n### Valid   \"intent\": 18\n    },\n    \"total\": 62\n  },\n  \"is_local\": false\n}\n```\n\nOutput:\n```json\n{\n  \"is_valid\": true,\n  \"error_details\": null,\n  \"tier_assignment\": {\n    \"tier\": 1,\n
